page.title: 10CARAVAN PARKS
page.content: There are lots of different caravan parks in our area.Some of these are Bagnol,Gwynfair,Heywoods and Lees.Gwynfair park hasn't got a shop but the other three have.In these shops they sell essential stuff for the carvaners. The busiest time is Summer when lots of people come to the area with their caravans.Some caravans are static they stay all year in the same place.The sites close in Winter.The caravan sites have small cement boxes with connections for electricity,gas and water for the caravaners.
